disabled.description: disabled, the telescopic pole will not be displayed.
disabled.description_zh: 禁用，将不会展示伸缩杆。

content.description: The contents of the current panel

min.description: The minimum threshold, which has a higher priority than max, and affects the threshold of adjacent panels.
min.description_zh: 最小阈值，优先级比 max高，并且会影响相邻面板的阈值。

size.description: The size of the segment can be 0~1 for a percentage, or a specific number of pixels, such as 300px
size.description_zh: 分割的大小，可以是 0~1 代表百分比，或具体数值的像素，如 300px

:trigger.type: (prevNode: ReactNode, resizeNode: ReactNode, nextNode: ReactNode) => ReactNode
:trigger.description: Customize the content of the telescopic lever, and the parameters represent the triggers that are quickly retracted forward, dragged and retracted, and quickly retracted backward
:trigger.description_zh: 定制伸缩杆内容, 参数分别表示向前快速收缩、拖拽伸缩触发器、向后快速收缩的触发器
